results.title: Hypersomnolence with beta-adrenergic blockers.
results.text_hl: When @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ was discontinued, he reported to have @<m>DISEASE_Ataxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001259 @@@lack of sleep@@@.
